summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4651 for the improvement of West 56th Street from 24th Avenue Northwest to 26th Avenue Northwest, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 54050, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
